## BinariesService.downloadItemBinary() method

Downloads the binary content of a Multimedia Component as a file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static downloadItemBinary(escapedItemId: string): CancelablePromise<any>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                                     |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedItemId | string | The URI of an item with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_0-1-1". |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt;

any The request was successful.

## Exceptions

ApiError
